entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this morning. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
